posts.author: johnbonmovi
posts.content: Slight suggestions, may want to drop epic prowess in favor for anything else as 1 ab makes not one iota of difference on arelith. Generally speaking you are either hitting your enemy with almost every swing, or you miss every attack. Also you may want to change the domain from war as its fairly useless from what I've seen on arelith, travel will get you great utility compared to war due to the lack of haste items, (no perma haste items, only 5 round duration potions/wands).
